title: Warm Smoked Mackerel and New Potato Salad

ingredients.item: 3 tbsp Waitrose mustard and honey dressing

instructions.step: Put the potatoes in a pan and cover with boiling water. Simmer for 10â€“12 minutes until tender, then drain. Stir in the mustard and honey dressing and leave to cool for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, toss the olive oil with the rocket, then season and divide between 4 plates.
Skin the mackerel, break into large flakes and stir into the potatoes with the shallot and chives. Add to the rocket and serve.
